data.name: Polyion
data.detailed_description:
Polyion is a casual world building game where you take ownership of several islands scattered in the middle of nowhere, which you the player have to look after and evolve using the many animals and buildings at your disposal. Use the world points you earn to place animals and buildings into the world and watch the islands thrive with life as you progress through the many eras of human history.



Your goal is to earn enough world points to progress into the new eras, from which you'll gain new objects to expand and evolve your islands. Will your world thrive or will it perish like all the rest?

World Building


You can place and remove buildings and animals in a world of randomly generated islands, which help in making each island look unique! You can make your world look messy or you can be more clean and organised putting different buildings and animals on separate islands.

Animals


Look after the animals that you place in the world with food and care, they are the backbone of your islands and help with improving your world score and providing more life to your islands on the rare occasion they bring a baby animal into the world.

Buildings


Buildings provide cosmetic value to your islands, but some of them will provide benefits to things like crops and other buildings too! There's a maintenance cost that is totalled based on all the buildings and their types that you have in the world, so be careful with what buildings you placed and WHERE you place them.

Eras


Eras allow you to evolve your world, with the world points you gather from looking after the islands you can progress onto new Eras from human history. These Eras give you access to new buildings and animals as you progress which can help with bringing more unique looks and benefits to your islands and the entire world.
